title: The Marriage of Juan and Maria, Cabá, Communities of Population in Resistance (CPR) of the Sierra, Quiché, Guatemala
marks: \"2)CPR16M 10/30/01 3-1/F11C28 D/B\", \"el:4000\", and \"Jonathan Moller\", in pencil, on back
description: couple at center; woman at R wears a long lace veil and holds a small bouquet of flowers; man at L wears a fedora and plaid shirt and carries a small plant; women and girls at R and L and behind couple; all figures wear rubber boots
